Class Monster

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity
      • Unit
        • Monster
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Aggressive, Passive

    public abstract class Monster
extends Unit
    Monster class. It is designed to be inherited by specific type of monsters such as active or passive.
    Author:
    Mubashwer Salman Khurshid (mskh, 601738)
